name: AH+XJJ CM Training
description:
We will be tackling the first two EoD Strike Missions on Challenge Mode:
<:maitrin:954126378511527986> **Aetherblade Hideout CM**
<:ankka:954126378473762866> **Xunlai Jade Junkyard CM**

No experience with the normal mode of both encounters is required, but it helps!

Any type of DPS works for both encounters, but ranged DPS classes like <:virtuoso:948585484165210162> **Power/Condi Virtuoso** , <:specter:948585463415992335> **Condi Specter**, <:scourge:763701209122471958> **Condi Scourge**, and <:harbinger:948585473645903903> **Condi Harbinger** tend to perform better for <:ankka:954126378473762866> **Xunlai Jade Junkyard**.

For <:maitrin:954126378511527986> **Aetherblade Hideout CM**, it is recommended to bring extra CC and projectile block/destruction.
For <:ankka:954126378473762866> **Xunlai Jade Junkyard CM**, bringing extra CC is also strongly recommended.

Let me know if you have any questions!
